meanings.definition: Having or showing a strong or greedy desire for something.
meanings.sent1: She is the grabbiest person I know when it comes to desserts.
meanings.sent2: The grabbiest child in the class always tries to take everyone else's toys.
meanings.sent3: The grabbiest squirrel in the park hoarded all the nuts for itself.
meanings.sent4: His grabbiest behavior at the buffet made everyone else wait for their turn.
meanings.sent5: The grabbiest seagull swooped down and snatched the sandwich right out of his hand.

meanings.definition: Tending to grab or seize things quickly or eagerly.
meanings.sent1: The grabbiest toddler in the daycare always reaches for toys first.
meanings.sent2: The grabbiest shoppers rushed to grab the best deals on Black Friday.
meanings.sent3: The grabbiest puppy in the litter tried to take all the toys at once.
meanings.sent4: The grabbiest vines in the garden seemed to reach out and grab anything that passed by.
meanings.sent5: The grabbiest octopus in the aquarium grabbed hold of everything in its tank.
